name: v3.4.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Revert "Only clear contenttypes cache when necessary" by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/859


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/compare/v3.4.6...v3.4.7

## What's Changed

* Added a simple helper function to get the tenant object
* Add decorator to make migrations.RunPython data migrations tenant-aware by @mmcclelland1002 in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/819
* Fix malformed link in docs by @browniebroke in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/838
* Tests & patches for #831 by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/834
* Fix Trove classifiers by @browniebroke in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/842
* Introduce a new setting to specify a custom migrate command by @browniebroke in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/840
* test cases: add a subfolder test case by @amrqt in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/839
* Only clear contenttypes cache when necessary by @adnathanail in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/826
* Execute tests in verbose mode by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/851

## New Contributors
* @browniebroke made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/838
* @amrqt made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/839

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/compare/v3.4.5...v3.4.6

name: v3.4.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove deprecated url imports from example projects by @algebra7 in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/806
* Update test matrix by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/804
* Allow all_tenants_command to run excluding public schema by @bartonip in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/795
* Bump django from 4.0.6 to 4.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/809
* ci: Run tests via coverage and send info to CodeCov by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/807
* Don't GRANT permissions to sequences when using IDENTITY columns. by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/810
* docs: Fix a few typos by @timgates42 in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/823
* Add test for clone_tenant command by @atodorov in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/808
* Fixed a bug renaming a schema by @tomturner in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/827
* Feature/get_executor hook by @mmcclelland1002 in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/814

## New Contributors
* @algebra7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/806
* @bartonip made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/795
* @timgates42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/pull/823

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/django-tenants/django-tenants/compare/V3.4.4...v3.4.5

name: V3.4.4
body: - made it work with Django 4.1 #780

name: v3.4.3
body:
- Added support for providing AppConfig in app lists #718
- Added a way of changing actioning special code when a tenant is set #762
- Fix TenantClient annotations #782

name: v3.4.2
body: - Fixed a problem installing on Django 4.0.x

name: v3.4.1
body:
- Reverted #676 as it caused some issue
- Allow schema names with special chars #704
- Ensure django_migrations table is created in a schema before migrations begin #705

name: v3.4.0
body:
- Added Django 4 support #700
- Fixed a problem with collect_static for django 3.2 and above #698
- Fix #663 - Fixed incompatibility of DatabaseSchemaIntrospection with django (#663 & #693)
- Enable to order tenants when migrating schemas #677
- Refactor database backend for easier subclassing #676

name: v3.3.4
body:
- Fixed a bug a problem cloning a tenant #668 
- Fixed a problem with the subfolder middleware #642
- Add create_missing_schemas command
- fix save to work for tenants with default value pk

name: v3.3.2
body: Added create_missing_schemas management command

name: v3.3.1
body:
-  Added new setting SHOW_PUBLIC_IF_NO_TENANT_FOUND
 -  Fix for Using collectstatic_schemas in django 3.1.x fails #602
 -  Added primary domain name in print statement along with schema_name when doing ? in tenant_command shell. #586

name: v3.2.1
body: - Fixed #466 a problem with the setup.py and Django 3.1

name: v3.2.0
body:
- #434 Allowed for Django 3.1 
 - #432 Added a beta version of subfolder tenants.
 - #458 Add a signal that gets sent after migrations finish for a schema

name: v3.1.0
body:
- Allowed a schema to be renamed. #388
- Stopped a crash id logging with the public tenant #358
- Fix clone_tenant command #379
- Cloning SQL changed to allow it work on AWS etc #381
- Now testing with workflow instead of Travis CI
- Read the docs now work again

name: v3.0.3
body: A fix to the clone_tenant that stopped it working on certain systems

name: v3.0.2
body:
Fixed #322 You can now clone a tenants with the clone_tenant command
Fixed some issues with docker-compose and the example project
Fixed #325 Refactor some classes/methods

name: v3.0.0
body:
- Django 3 support
- Removed psycopg2 as a requirement #317
- Changed docker image to python 3.7 image
- Do not pip install --quiet while testing
- Added database support to validate schemas #312
- allow to disable new coloring of tenant app in admin #272

**Fixes**

- Fixed an issue where tenant-specific application static files (stylesheets, Javascript, images etc.), that have not been collected yet using ``collectstatic_schemas``, were not being found using ``TenantStaticFilesStorage``. Fixes `#265 <https://github.com/tomturner/django-tenants/issues/265>`_.
- Fix a crash (ProgrammingError) when attempting to create a schema named like a SQL keyword (select, where, ...)
Allow to create a tenant named with only numbers (123). #302 #307

name: v2.2.3
body:
**Fixes**

- Fixed an issue in setup.py to allow different colour of tenant apps in the admin area. Should now work with PyPi.

name: v2.2.2
body:
**Fixes**

- Fixed an issue with the different colour of tenant apps in the admin area. [#261]

name: v2.1.1
body:
**Fixes**

- Fixed an issue with the different colour of tenant apps in the admin area. [#261]

name: v2.2.0
body:
**Fixes**

- TenantFileSystemStorage now works [#249]

**Enhancements**

- support django>=2.2 [#238]
- TenantAdminMixin is available in order to register the tenant model. [#223]
- Admin site: highlight with a different colour the tenant apps. [#227]
- Admin site: disable the tenant apps when in the public schema. [#227]
- Custom auth backend compatibility for TenantClient. [#228]
- Switch to psycopg2 dependency rather than psycopg2-binary[#239]

name: v2.1.0
body:
Added Django 2.1 Support

More notes to follow
Django version 2 support. This version doesn't work with any of the Django 1 version

* TEMPLATE_CONTEXT_PROCESSORS deprecated  …
  * Use correct schema_name on django 1.11 introspection
  * Add percent progress to migration output
 * Fix django 1.9 and 1.10 problem with the old commands

Updates for Django 1.11
 

#128 - Does django-tenants work with Django 1.11?
#125 - Adding a safety check inside tenant model save and delete for compatibility

Warning
Middleware is now in a directory

Fixed #107 a Django 1.10 error
Fixed #109 missing files on pypi

name: v1.2.0
body:
- Made it so the tests run with python 3
- Specializing static and media based on tenants #108 thanks to @mateuspadua

More Django 1.10 stuff

#95 fixed tenant_command for django 1.10

#100 Added fast test cases

#101 Added logging

#102 Added reverse
Django 1.10 stuff

name: v1.1.4
body:
Fixed a problem in Django 1.9 todo with urlresolvers
Some change to allow the test to work in Python 3 (Untested)

name: v1.1.3
body: Added Clone Tenant management command
More fixes to parallel migrations

name: v1.1.1
body: A fix to the setup.py for migration_executors

name: v1.1.0
body: Added migration executor layer #39

Added PostGis support #22 

Fixed a tenant_command #3 

Fixed a problem with migrations #20
